summary: Stand Alone Re-Textured Dragonborn DLC Nordic Weapons with Glowing Runes.  Replacer Version available.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is inspired by the Runed Nord Hero Weapons here - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2525

1.2 - Runed shield in addition to each weapon and shield having either a shout or apropriate 3 word phrase in dragon script in replace of the Dovahkiin runes. *minor hickup on uploading the files but they should now be correct with textures having the unique weapon shouts.*

Dagger - KRII LUN AUS - Kill Leech Suffer - Marked for Death
Sword - HUN KAAL ZOOR - Hero Champion Legend - Call of Valor
Great Sword - SU GRAH DUN - Air Battle Grace - Elemental Fury 
War Axe - MID VUR SHAAN - Loyal Valor Inspire - Battle Furry
Great Axe - FAAS RU MARR - Fear Run Terror - Dismay
Mace - GAAN LAH HAAS - Stamina Magicka Health - Drain Vitality
Warhammer - FUS RO DAH - Force Balance Push - Unrelenting Force
Bow - WULD NA KEST - Whirlwind Fury Tempest - Whirlwind Sprint
Shield - IISS SLEN NUS - Ice Flesh Statue - Ice Form

As a future note I will be using the Dragon Aspect shout for the armor -
MUL QAH DIIV - Strength Armor Wyrm - Dragon Aspect

Steam Workshop - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=130830125

This mod adds Runed versions of the Nordic Weapons from the Dragonborn DLC.  They are stand alone weapons not a replacer.  In addition these Runed Nordic weapons use the same stats as the Nordic Weapons and the only difference is the added glow texture and glow map.  They can also be crafted, tempered, and enchanted.  Each weapon has Dovahkiin on the weapon, Sword-Dagger-War Axe is on the blade, Battle Axe-Mace is on the handle, Warhammer is on top of the head, Bow is on the front of the arms.  If anyone has suggestions for a different dragon text for specific weapons feel free to pm me with a suggestion.

My aim is similar to the Runed Nord Hero Weapons to where the weapons are unique and so that only the Dovahkiin Player has access to them and you won\'t be seeing them on random bandit NPC\'s and such using them.

Instalation -----

Extract or manually copy and past the \"meshes\", \"textures\" and the \"Runed_Nordic_Weapons.esp\" into your Skyrim \"data\" folder.

Required Files -----
Dragonborn DLC 

Version -----
1.1 - Updated Main ESP and the Recipes for each weapon.
replacer v- 1.2
V - 1.0
Dagger
Sword
Great Sword

Changelog -----

-fixed errors in replacer version, and hopfuly fixed sword.
-Added Replacer version of the main files.
V - 1.0 - All weapons finished.

permissions -----
Free Use as long as credit is given and the original author is notified.
author: foxlight713
